The Python26 directory in the seattle distribution has been specially modified to save as much space as possible, and to run successfully independent of other computer settings. This is a record of the modifications made to it.


Changed File Names:

README --> README_PYTHON.txt
LICENSE --> LICENSE_PYTHON.txt


Removed:

DLLs/*.ico
DLLs/sqlite3.dll
DLLs/tcl85.dll
DLLs/tclpip85.dll
tcl/
Doc/
Tools/
Lib/curses/
Lib/email
Lib/idlelib/
Lib/sqlite3/
Lib/xml/
Lib/wsgiref/


Copied from C:\Windows\System32:

python26.dll
msvcr71.dll
